not_right: This is not a right triangle. Formula: a² + b² = c²
right: This is a right triangle! Formula: a² + b² = c²
about_info: This program allows you to check whether a triangle is right-angled using the Pythagorean theorem. Simply enter the three sides of the triangle and the program will automatically determine whether they satisfy the formula a² + b² = c². This is a handy math checker that can be useful for students, teachers, and anyone working with geometry.
